summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Magnolia Lane (formerly the Alley between Blocks 36 and 37 Ladd's Addition), from West Armour Street to the north line of Tract 19, Assessor's Plat of Carleton Highlands Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority 100% Limit Petition No. 151281 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
